description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. In Velocity: Escape from puzzle hell, your soul has been trapped inside a soulball by the puzzle-devil himself. To escape you need to solve a number of puzzles by getting the ball to the soul-portal. Do you have what it takes to escape from puzzle hell?
description.short: In Velocity: Escape from puzzle hell, your soul has been trapped inside a soulball by the puzzle-devil himself. To escape you need to solve a number of puzzles by getting the ball to the soul-portal. Do you have what it takes to escape from puzzle hell?
